Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.map

This package defines all related classes to support functionalities regarding to Map specification.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MappingDataManager Defines the interface that an implementation of UI mapping data manager needs to provide to facilitate other parties to take real actions against underline mapping data.
 

Class Summary
BaseTree This class provides some abstract implementations of commonly used tree features in this application.
DefaultMappingTreeCellRender The class defines the default tree cell renderer for mapping panel.
FunctionConstantDefinitionDialog This class defines ...
MappingFileSynchronizer This class defines an add-on mapping file synchronization manager to help monitor any update on the associated mapping files.
MappingPanel The class is the main panel to construct the UI and initialize the utilities to facilitate mapping functions.
MiddlePanel The panel is used to render graphical respresentation of the mapping relations between source and target tree panel.
PseudoRootTreeNode This class defines a pseudo root tree node as the place holder to indicate the type of tree.
SourceTree This class provides a customized tree to support the "source" in the mapping.
TargetTree This class provides a customized tree to support the "target" in the mapping.
TargetTreeDragTransferHandler This class handles drag-related data manipulation for target tree on the mapping panel.
TargetTreeDropTransferHandler This class handles drop-related data manipulation for target tree on the mapping panel.
 

Enum Summary
MappingFileSynchronizer.FILE_TYPE  
 

Package gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.map Description

This package defines all related classes to support functionalities regarding to Map specification.
